definition: to cross (a road, an ocean etc)/to cut across

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
Hengduan mountains, several parallel mountain ranges on the border between west Yunnan and Sichuan and east Tibet

sentences.english: The cross section design is an important part of the road design.
sentences.chinese: 道路横断面设计是道路设计的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The process of subgrade drainage and railway-use land design is related with cross section design directly.
sentences.chinese: 路基排水用地设计与横断面设计成果直接相关。

sentences.english: The dominant plane for showing the parapharyngeal space was suggested.
sentences.chinese: 并提出咽旁间隙在横断面上的最佳显示平面。

sentences.english: Seed flattened dorsally in cross section, face concave .
sentences.chinese: 种子背面扁平在横断面上，表面凹。

sentences.english: Small forest Liang Shan area is located in traverse mountain chain east side.
sentences.chinese: 小凉山地区地处横断山脉东侧。

sentences.english: Thecal sac cross-sectional area was calculated at each disc space.
sentences.chinese: 计算每个椎间隙处的硬膜囊横断面积。

sentences.english: Also this paper discusses the cross-sectional elements and the cross-sectional forms of the connected-way.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了衔接道路横断面构成要素和采用的横断面形式。

sentences.english: Also this paper discusses the cross-sectional elements and the cross-sectional forms of the connected-way.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了衔接道路横断面构成要素和采用的横断面形式。

sentences.english: Method cluster sampling and cross sectional study.
sentences.chinese: 方法整群抽样，横断面调查。

sentences.english: Each rat underwent right sciatic nerve transection.
sentences.chinese: 显露每只动物的右侧坐骨神经，利刀横断。

sentences.english: Objective To study Fanniidae fauna in Hengduan Mountains Region.
sentences.chinese: 目的对中国横断山区厕蝇科昆虫进行区系调查。

sentences.english: Information runs through the whole management precess.
sentences.chinese: 信息“横断”于管理全过程。

sentences.english: Therapeutic transverse patellar fracture type separation using tension-band wire fixation.
sentences.chinese: 治疗上横断分离型髌骨骨折，采用张力带钢丝内固定。

sentences.english: L5transected group:acontractile detrusor with increase residual urine.
sentences.chinese: L5横断组为逼尿肌无力残余尿大量型膀胱。

sentences.english: The geographical distribution of Labiatae in Hengduan Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 横断山区唇形科植物的地理分布。

sentences.english: The domes are circular or ovoid in cross-section .
sentences.chinese: 穹丘的横断面为圆形或卵圆形。

definition: Hengduan mountains, several parallel mountain ranges on the border between west Yunnan and Sichuan and east Tibet
Tianshan mountain range between XinJiang and Mongolia and Kyrgyzstan
